TopicTitle: Rath's Stock Crafts--SEP series partially added

Articles.Content:
So this is the place I will consolidate many of my crafts that I post to the forum.

 

SEP-1 Series

This is a series of suborbital rockets, mainly focused on a realistic aesthetic and development process.  I am in cambodia with terrible wifi, and because there is ~20 diffrent models and upgades, this may be posted a bit later. 

SEP-1

The first version of the rocket.  Sports a small LES and an LVT-45 with an small fairing.

http://imgur.com/bd0yvSu

https://www.dropbox.com/s/sq37fshv8mhvmpu/SEP-1.craft?dl=0

SEP-1B

The second version of the rocket.  Features a lower stage stretched by ~1.5m.  The LES is modified to improve functionality.

http://imgur.com/siDHfqf

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ewx9yzas6jyyye8/SEP-1B.craft?dl=0

SEP-1C

adds an extra clamp at the top of the rocket.

http://imgur.com/65xRltU

https://www.dropbox.com/s/pwdftl9ag8nf14l/SEP-1C.craft?dl=0

SEP-1D

Fixes fuel flow issues and adds (100% prettiness based) gimbaling hydraulics.

http://imgur.com/7vUVNGc

https://www.dropbox.com/s/4p4yrdhzta2tmn0/SEP-1D.craft?dl=0

SEP-1E

Moves one of the clamps to the other side of the rocket to solve seperation issues. Underwhelming, I know :/

http://imgur.com/7Y8hOjP

Sorry folks, im all out of time, so here is the download for the entire series: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/il2v5d37ek7gopr/AAAPBQz0oEp6-dluJY5fDVPqa?dl=0

 

ME-293

A 100% fictional jet fighter aircraft, made in a late-war german style.  Top speed is ~200m/s at 1000m with each engine producing 10.5kn of thrust(65 thrust limiter for more realistic performance.)  Max climb angle with 10.5kn (About jumo 004 max thrust) per engine: ~17 degrees.  Max speed in vertical dive from 6000m to 1000m is ~304m/s.  There are two small bulges under the cockpit in order to hold more fuel and Mk103/108 cannons. The monopropellant is kept in the cockpit to represent the weight of the guns ammunition.

Here is a download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/:/ME-293.craft?dl=0

 

KS2X 'Uno'

This is a early-modern jet fighter based around a US military project that involved fitting two modified jets into a single fuselage in a line.  One of the results of this would be that the US military wouldn't have a repeat of the PO-2 (1920's soviet biplane cropduster used as a bomber, credited with the only biplane-to-jet air kill, when an starfighter jet (?) slowed down too much to engage one, and the aircraft stalled and crashed) in Korea situation, where the enemies aircraft was so slow, the fast jets couldn't get their guns on it because the aircraft could run at low and high speeds.  The first jet was modified to run as cool as possible, and the second was reinforced against heat.  An afterburner was also included.  A later model had the first engine being capable of rotating the fan blades horizontal to the airflow, in order to allow only the back jet to be run for long haul cruises.  To replicate this programs planned result, I clipped two engines together, cause it seemed cool to include this.  The project was rejected because of the need for brand new airframes that scared the aerodynaisicts (is this a word???!!!) cause of the length of the engine and need for a lot of fuel.  The action groups are 1 for afterburners, 0 for one engine off, 9 for the other engine off.  Abort for drogue parachute.  There are two 100 LF drop tanks under the wings.

http://imgur.com/94w0rCg

Here is a download:https://www.dropbox.com/s/kp20izxpaqupykv/KS2X%20%27Uno%27.craft?dl=0

 

KA-55 Perigrine

This aircraft is an ww2 style prop plane, with an engine inside an openable cowling just for looks.  It has a crappy turn radius, and a even worse top speed (ww2 you see).  Action groups are 1 for flaps, 5 for opening cowling, six for closing it.  Top speed ~100m/s in a test that took <1min and 1300m.

http://imgur.com/J4StW7Z

Here is the download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/wuluaoy8ttqhx7u/KA-55%20Perigrine.craft?dl=0

 

A2K366 Bomber

This aircraft is a two-engine modern schnellbomber (fast bomber) with two turbo-ramjets.  This model carried two unguided, gyro-stabilized .625m diameter rockets externally, attached to the fuselage.  This plane is pretty, fast and decently turning, but the energy retention is a war crime.  It reeeeeaaaallly low wing loading too.

http://imgur.com/We5g3WG

Here is a download:https://www.dropbox.com/s/yswkfidvqpobhjc/A2K3366%20Bomber.craft?dl=0

 

 

Kerbolev Civ. Div. 1

Just to prove not everything I make is militaristic (Racing crafts, i mean.  No! I want to be able to leave a room!  Help! Anyone! Help! Hel--BANG!) here is a nice, happy, great, amazing peoples aircraft where nothing bad can ever happen!  Any similarities to the ME-923 in the tail are many coincidence!  Great peoples government says so!  No missile bases in the background! Is for launching Satellites to tell you the Truth with glorious governments Television! And the real thoughts of the people!  

http://imgur.com/KlfGVUD

Here is a download:https://www.dropbox.com/s/f1nfln1edhuid9j/Kerbolev%20CIV_%20DIV_-1.craft?dl=0

 

I'll put up more later

 

Kerbolev Civ. Div 2

This aircraft is a jet-powered passenger and cargo bush flying boat, that can cary 8 kerbals.  it also has racks under the wings for large amounts of cargo, the one in the download is carrying heavy girders, to build a big thing out in the faraway place where the bad people go to become the good people but you never see them again, little Valentina.  The version in the download cannot take off from water with the construction load, but in can use the land wheels to lift off.  Without too much cargo, the aircraft takes off fine from the water.

http://imgur.com/3k49WyY

Here is a download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/8jbatcf7w28puqt/Kerbolev%20CIV_%20DIV_-2.craft?dl=0

Edited April 2, 2016 by Rath
Added Kerbolev Civ Div 2 Flying boat
Added the beginnings of the SEP-1 Series suborbital rockets.
I'll be adding an low speed STOL internal RATO aircraft soon.
